name: Sentiment Analysis
description: Is this comment positive or negative? Find out the tone.

api_methods.name: Analyze (post)
api_methods.description: Return sentiment analysis results with score for the given text.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: Enter some text to analyze (maximum 100 words or 1,500 characters)
parameters.default: great value in its price range!
